definitions.definition: A large tree, Ochroma pyramidale , native to tropical America , with wood that is very light in weight.
A raft or float , used principally on the Pacific coast of South America.

main_definition: A large tree, Ochroma pyramidale , native to tropical America , with wood that is very light in weight.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The wood of this tree.
A raft or float , used principally on the Pacific coast of South America.
